name: O’PENing
overview: O'PENing is the new name of Drama Stage which has been broadcasting the winning work of the O'PEN storyteller contest. The franchise will continue to make meaningful steps to introduce and support new writers to see the light of the world and diversify content genres.

seasons.name: O'PENing 2022
seasons.overview: O'PENing is the new name of Drama Stage which has been broadcasting the winning work of the O'PEN storyteller contest. The franchise will continue to make meaningful steps to introduce and support new writers to see the light of the world and diversify content genres.

seasons.name: O'PENing 2023
seasons.overview:
It's for me and you seven stories full of human scents.  Discovered by CJ ENM's O'PEN contest,  7 new writers with unique characteristics,  7 bright new directors meet,  from one-act plays to series, beyond the limits of material and form,

7 new dramas were created.

episodes.name: Shared Office Hookup Episode 1
episodes.overview: A romance story of a woman who encounters her ex-boyfriend and a one-night stand in the same shared office.

episodes.name: Shared Office Hookup Episode 2
episodes.overview: A romance story of a woman who encounters her ex-boyfriend and a one-night stand in the same shared office.

episodes.name: XX+XY Episode 1
episodes.overview: A story of a child born with the XXXY syndrome who decides to choose their own gender and future while going through adolescence.

episodes.name: XX+XY Episode 2
episodes.overview: A story of a child born with the XXXY syndrome who decides to choose their own gender and future while going through adolescence.

episodes.name: XX+XY Episode 3
episodes.overview: A story of a child born with the XXXY syndrome who decides to choose their own gender and future while going through adolescence.

episodes.name: XX+XY Episode 4
episodes.overview: A story of a child born with the XXXY syndrome who decides to choose their own gender and future while going through adolescence.

episodes.name: Find The 1st Prize
episodes.overview: A comic story of a man in quarantine finding out that he won the first prize in the lottery but only one day left to claim.

episodes.name: Don't Announce Your Husband's Death
episodes.overview: A story of a man biologically lacking reproduction abilities and a whimsical pregnant woman who aim to succeed in a pregnancy project.

episodes.name: My Beautiful Apartment
episodes.overview: A story of people living in a rental apartment complex encountering neighbors who are not as beautiful as the apartment.

episodes.name: Flavor of Your Voice
episodes.overview: A love story of a man who finds love the most difficult and a woman who finds love the easiest.

episodes.name: The First Glance
episodes.overview: A story of two women; one who wants to kill and the other who wants to be killed, driving on a snowy road.

episodes.name: Stock of High School
episodes.overview: A story of a high school girl who brings stock into vogue, standing against rich competitors and the market.

episodes.name: Babel Syndrome
episodes.overview: A story of a poor youth confessing in a world where language is money.

episodes.name: Death Deliverer
episodes.overview: A story of a man who delivers death and a woman who orders death riding together. They encounter those who wish to live as much as they wish to die.

1.name: O'PENing 2022
1.overview: O'PENing is the new name of Drama Stage which has been broadcasting the winning work of the O'PEN storyteller contest. The franchise will continue to make meaningful steps to introduce and support new writers to see the light of the world and diversify content genres.

episodes.name: Summer, Love Machine, Blues
episodes.overview: A road movie of the exchange of tutoring and working between Lee Soo, an owner of an adult toy shop who has failed in getting a stable job, and Dream, a passionate student who is self-taught.

episodes.name: A Walk
episodes.overview: Sunjae, and elderly man living alone, has encountered a bothersome mission. His wife, Gwui-ae used to take care of a quaint, old-fashioned little dog named Sundungi, and now he has to walk it.

episodes.name: Summer Cold
episodes.overview: A woman, who lived in despair to the point where she didn't care if she died tomorrow, puts her life on the line for the first time ever to protect a man, in a passionate, summer-limited, romance noir.

episodes.name: The Reason for Our Break Up
episodes.overview: Two divorced people in their 30's, who is now capable to do anything easily as age and experiences have mounted up, but feels love to have become harder.

episodes.name: Bruised Like a Peach
episodes.overview: "It will rot if you keep pressing it!" The love story of Jang Ha-goo, who protects her mother's old supermarket, and Kim Kang-su, who yearns for a lost love.
A ten-year-old child discovers a six-year-old child trapped inside a house and gradually helps her come out of the house.

episodes.name: Perfect Shot Episode 1
episodes.overview: A high school prodigy marksman who manipulated matches to protect her dreams and family, dreams of making a comeback seven years later.

episodes.name: Perfect Shot Episode 2
episodes.overview: A high school prodigy marksman who manipulated matches to protect her dreams and family, dreams of making a comeback seven years later.
